HPOExplorer 0.99.1

HPOExplorer

Authors: Robert Gordon-Smith, Brian M. Schilder, Nathan G .Skene

Most recent update: Nov-10-2021

Intro

This package contains useful functions for working with the Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO). It allows you to create interactive phenotype network plots, as well as many other useful functions.

Installation

Within R:

if(!"remotes" %in% rownames(install.packages())){install.packages("remotes")}

remotes::install_github("neurogenomics/HPOExplorer")

Documentation

Visit the package site for a tutorial and docs for functions.
HPOExplorer site
